name: Udruga ekoloških poljoprivrednih proizvođača Hrvatske
goal: UEPP is a Croatian national NGO that organizes organic certified producers into an association. UEPP promotes and organizes organic fairs and organic certificate. Also it is active in policy making in Croatia for organic agriculture.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Education, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Organic agriculture is main focus of out organisation. This is all of our efforts put into organic agriculture.
